1206.Dex Entry: It is way bigger than the actual Pyukumuku. Expelling its internal organs, it propels itself to strike its opponent.

1207.Dex Entry: It is a real anomaly between X Pokémon. Its nature makes it friendly even to human.

1208.Dex Entry: They sneak up falling from the sky in large groups, so they can overcome their small size. Then they bring the prey to Galvantula.

1209.Dex Entry: It freezes the air around its nest. Then it traps preys in a thick ice web, slowly leading them to hypothermia.

1210.Dex Entry: It produces a delicious low-calory cream, but it becomes rancid if not kept cool.

1211.Dex Entry: Compressed by an enormous pressure, it body is protected by a shell as hard as steel. Nobody knows how it looks inside this shell.

1212.Dex Entry: It catches even the most elusive preys with its claws. It tortures them and, once it's fed up, it let them go.

1213.Dex Entry: Because its intelligence is exceptional, Gengar can communicate with any form of life. However, it uses this gift for not-so-ethical purposes.

1214.Dex Entry: Its calcareous shell resembles an ancient water jar. It is unknown if men's artifacts were inspired by this Pokémon or vice versa.

1215.Dex Entry: Its limbs are made of pure cristalline water. Some people believe that a single sip of that water will give you everlasting life.

1216.Dex Entry: A thick cloud mane makes it float in the air. It is still a green baby, so it can only clumsily fly around.

1217.Dex Entry: (Quiet Mode) A peaceful tempered X Pokémon. However, if it gets furious, it wraps itself in thunderclouds and triggers raging lightning storms.

1218.Dex Entry: Because its appearance resembles a severed head, everyone who fights this Cacnea is scared to death.

1219.Dex Entry: Its internal body is made of a straw-like material. It shoots its needles to cast cursed spell against enemies.

1220.Dex Entry: The appealing sweet fragrance it releases vaguely resembles that of Leppa Berries. Behind its delicious appearance lies an acid filling.

1221.Dex Entry: Anyone who digests its sweets will feel a strong sense of nausea. The more you eat them, the bigger Slurpuff gets.

1222.Dex Entry: If you put your ear to its sound organ, you will hear the sound of a soft breathing. When it's fired up, the sound becomes defeaning.

1223.Dex Entry: Using the auricular organs on its arms, Roselia amplifies the range of its voice. It can even break rocks at full volume.

1224.Dex Entry: It waves its stings to modify any sound wave at will. If it interferes with its opponents' heartbeat, it will cause them irreparable harm.

1225.Dex Entry: When frightened, it shoots fire and sparks from the top of its head. It appears to be pretty friendly with others of the same specie.

1226.Dex Entry: The special toxin it secretes, when heated, shines brightly. It lures preys and trap them, using its body as a cage.

1227.Dex Entry: It moves under cover of darkness. It throws knives of hell fire at its opponents, piercing their flesh and leaving them with atrocious burns.

1228.Dex Entry: Gym Leader Surge's faithful companion, it has been brought back to life after a terrible accident. It is as fast as fragile.

1229.Dex Entry: The Bisharp owned by Dimension Sergeant S. The consciences of both A & B's Bisharp coexist in this Pokémon.

1230.Dex Entry: The Scovile owned by Dimension Colonel Dahlia. When ingested, its seeds will electrocute the body from the inside.

1231.Dex Entry: The Tyranitar owned by Dimension General Victor. It generates a defeaning buzz by vibrating its wings.

1232.Dex Entry: It has been further genetically modified by Team Dimension. Its psychic powers are frightening.

1233.Dex Entry: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Peyote.

1234.Dex Entry: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Niva.

1235.Dex Entry: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Abraham.

1236.Dex Entry: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Chua.

1237.Dex Entry: It secretes ice-fresh cream from its tail. If the quality doesn't match its high requirements, it throws that away.

1238.Dex Entry: Following a great number of experiments, it became extremely unstable, but it developed the ability to Transform even without seeing its target.

1239.Dex Entry: It's mentioned in legends as the companion of the First King. It uses its momentum to move at high speeds.

2000.Dex Entry: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

2001.Dex Entry: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

2002.Dex Entry: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

2003.Dex Entry: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.

2004.Dex Entry: The star patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.

2005.Dex Entry: If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.

2006.Dex Entry: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted.

2007.Dex Entry: The bright light on its tail can be seen far away. It has been treasured since ancient times as a beacon.

2008.Dex Entry: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and Teleport to safety.

2009.Dex Entry: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

2010.Dex Entry: Its brain can outperform a super-computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

2011.Dex Entry: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

2012.Dex Entry: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

2013.Dex Entry: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 300 feet.

2014.Dex Entry: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

2015.Dex Entry: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.

2016.Dex Entry: An enigmatic Pokémon that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

2017.Dex Entry: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

2018.Dex Entry: As it majestically swims, it doesn't care if Remoraid attach to it for scavenging its leftovers.

2019.Dex Entry: The Berries it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.

2020.Dex Entry: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

2021.Dex Entry: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

2022.Dex Entry: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

2023.Dex Entry: Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.

2024.Dex Entry: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

2025.Dex Entry: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

2026.Dex Entry: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

2027.Dex Entry: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

2028.Dex Entry: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

2029.Dex Entry: Under a full moon, this Pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

2030.Dex Entry: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

2031.Dex Entry: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

2032.Dex Entry: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

2033.Dex Entry: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.

2034.Dex Entry: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

2035.Dex Entry: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

2036.Dex Entry: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

2037.Dex Entry: Vicious in nature, it drives Pidgey from their nests and feasts on the eggs that are left behind.

2038.Dex Entry: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

2039.Dex Entry: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

2040.Dex Entry: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.

2041.Dex Entry: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.

2042.Dex Entry: Because its fangs are too heavy, it always keeps its head tilted down. However, its Bite is powerful.

2043.Dex Entry: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

2044.Dex Entry: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion.

2045.Dex Entry: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up the sun's rays.

2046.Dex Entry: A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.

2047.Dex Entry: Meganium's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.

2048.Dex Entry: Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees. It looks in all directions to seek out insects as its prey.

2049.Dex Entry: This powerful Pokémon thrusts its prized horn under its enemies' bellies then lifts and throws them.

2050.Dex Entry: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.

2051.Dex Entry: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

2052.Dex Entry: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
